import React, { useState } from "react"; import { alter } from "./frstprojectarray"; export const Update=(name)=>{ const[pos]=useState(name.where) const[fun,setfun]=useState({ "foodname":name.mention.foodname, "cstarters":name.mention.cstarters, "cdesert":name.mention.cdesert, "price":name.mention.price }) const yet=(aarthi01)=>{ const{name,value}=aarthi01.target setfun( (back)=>{ return{ ...back, [name]:value } } ) } const sweetie=()=>{ alter(pos,fun) alert("Updated") } const candy=()=>{ alert("Rejected") } return( <>

Chicken Briyani
Mutton Briyani




) }
